runs.comm: bowled! Short of a length on the off and turns away sharply, Richards tries to run it past slip, gets a thick inside edge straight into the off stump, what a start!
bowled from behind the wicket there, down the leg side through, given a wide
charges down the pitch and is struck high on the pads
round the wicket to the left hander, down the leg side again, another run gifted

dropped, spun in sharply from middle, Smith shaped up for a cut but was surprised by the turn, was caught on the glove and it struck Mushfiqut on the shoulder, he couldn't take in off the second attempt either
quickish on leg stump, turned away to short fine
quickish and short outside off, punched straight to cover
pushed through the line towards mid-on for a single to keep the strike
oooh, almost, short , just wide of the off stump, goes for the cut, misses and it evades the stumps by a whisker
tossed up outside off, drilled down the ground towards long-off for a single
flatter trajectory, on middle and leg, shuffles across and flicks it away just wide of short fine for a single
that was coming, tossed up on middle, gets to the pitch and slog-sweeps it over the deep midwicket boundary for a pressure-relieving six
it's pitched up outside off this time and he takes full toll, crashing it powerfully over the covers for a boundary, Smith to the rescue
fullish on middle, driven with a straight bat back to the bowler
turned away sharply from a good length outside off, left alone
slightly short outside off, moves back and punches it to midwicket
flighted outside off, goes for the slog-sweep but is beaten by the turn, makes no contact
short on middle, worked away between square leg and midwicket for a single
long hop on leg stump, pulled away to deep midwicket for a single to keep the strike
hurled it short outside off, gave Smith enough time to rock back and punish that over midwicket for a boundary, poor ball, less than a 100 needed now
another one, the pressure has come off, long hop again, short and wide, Smith has enough time to rock back and dismiss that over deep midwicket straight into the crowd
three in a row, short outside leg stump, Smith has no trouble helping it on its way wide of short fine for a boundary
short, but on middle and off this time, cut away straight to point
lands on leg stump and turns in towards middle, whips it away to deep square leg for a single
quicker through the air, pitched up outside off, pushed back to the bowler
pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
short on the off stump, moves back and chops it down to cover
slightly short on middle, rocks back and pulls it away wide of deep midwicket, the fielder stretches full length to back in just inside the ropes but they get three
good length on middle and off, defended from the crease back to the bowler
turned away from a good length on middle, guided behind slip past point for a single, didn't read the turn too well there
pushed through full on the off stump, defended watchfully towards point
back of a length outside off, chopped down to cover off the back foot
length ball on middle, in the slot for Fletcher who with a free swing of the arms thrashes it wide of long-on to the ropes
slower one bowled short outside off, dabbed behind point from the crease
fullish on the off, reaches forward and drives it to mid-off who's at the edge of the circle for a single

appeal for lbw, slower one, the offcutter, moves well across to turn it fine, it clips the pads to beat short fine to the boundary, landed outside off and cut back in to strike him in line, surprising that the appeal was not upheld, seemed adjacent and the height didn't seem to be a problem

poor decision, the offcutter again, moving in from outside off and Fletcher was struck on the pads outside the line as he got forward to defend, the umpire, after some thinking, raised his finger but that shouldn't have been given, not when you're struck outside the line while playing a shot, it wouldn't even have gone on to hit the stumps
starts off with a wide, down the leg side
short on middle, whipped away towards deep square leg for a single
short and wide, turns away sharply, goes for the cut, misses
tossed up on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
bowled flat outside off, comes down the track and lofts that inside out to bisect the gap between long-off and deep cover to the ropes
short on middle, rocks back and turns it away wristily towards square leg for a single
short outside off, moved back, waits for it to turn in and slaps it wide of deep cover for a couple of runs
nipped back in just a touch, tried to open the face to guide that down to third man but didn't connect
short and wide , cuts it away really hard just wide of third man, enough time to come back for the second
pulled away powerfully, erred in length there, dropped it too short and Dowlin took advantage, rocking back and dispatching it over square leg
slower one, converts it into a low full toss, dragging it wide of long-on and rushing back to complete the second run in time
slower one bowled full on leg stump, tickles it to fine leg for a single
the offcutter, slightly short on middle and off, Smith comes down the track and cuts it straight to point
back of a length on the off, dropped just behind point for a single
well fielded at mid-off, was pitched up and Smith struck it with some ferocity but Tamim was alert and quick on his feet
short on middle and leg, swivels and whips it away uppishly between fine leg and deep square leg for a couple of runs

a twist to the tale, short of a length just outside off, goes for the pull in front of midwicket, keeps a little low, gets a thin under-edge straight to the keeper who takes a good low catch diving to his right
struck high on the pads as he shuffles to work it fine, leapt off the pitch, more than he expected
short and wide, chases it and taps it down towards third man for a single to get off the mark and keep the strike
tossed up outside off, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
spun in from outside off, defended in front of the bowler as it turned back in
tossed it up outside off, leaned into the drive as he placed it between deep cover and deep point for a couple, what's more it's a no ball and therefore a freehit
cashes in, it's tossed up, full and wide and he crashes that between deep cover and deep point, the same direction as the previous delivery, but this time with more elevation and force, to the ropes
goes for the sweep, top edges it just over short fine for a single
short and wide, goes for the cut but it keeps really low and zips under his bat
slightly short outside off, dragged towards mid-on from the crease
landed on a good length on middle, moved back to turn it fine but was struck high on the pads
length ball outside off, driven back firmly to the bowler
slower one this time, full, waits for it and guides it down to third man for a single
gets forward and drops it short of extra cover, calls for a single, Naeem scores a direct hit at the non-striker's end but Reifer is well in
too close to cut, was going over off and middle, quite a bit of pace on it and it went through Dowlin even before he got into position to play that one
flat on middle and off, pushed between cover and point for a single
flat on leg stump, played in front of midwicket for a single
fired in short and wide, came down the track to cut it past point, was out of his crease but managed to take it back in before Mushfiqur took down the bails
quickish on middle and off, defended into the leg side
flighted, gave it some air this time, on middle and leg, clipped away to deep backward square leg, he's a little wide and allows them enough time to come back for the second
tossed up on middle and leg, gets front and across and drives it straight to midwicket
short on middle, pulled away towards deep square leg for a single
slightly short on leg stump, swivels and whips it down to fine leg
full and wide, hangs his bat out and guides it down to third man for a single
targeting the blockhole, it turns out to be a low full toss on middle, flicks it away elegantly through the vacant midwicket region for a boundary
lands on a good length on middle, moves across and defends it back to the bowler
the offcutter, seemed to pitch outside leg and cut back in to strike him in front of middle and off as he got forward to play it into the off side, strong appeal turned down
tossed it up outside off, driven back to the  bowler
drew him out of the crease, looked to clear midwicket there but was struck on the pads
slightly short on the off, pushed back to the bowler
flighted just outside off, worked just wide of midwicket for a quick single
Reifer strikes that cleanly, comes down the track, gets to the pitch and clips it over midwicket for a boundary
pushed just wide of midwicket off the front foot but the single isn't there
tossed it up, buts its well outside off, tries to dig it out, missed
tossed up, landed on the off stump and spun away just a touch, Dowlin went for a massive heave over midwicket, missed and was struck on the pads, but it probably would have missed off
bunts it through the off side towards deep cover for a single
on middle and leg, comes down the track and swipes it towards deep midwicket for one more
full and wide, chases it and gets into a really awkward position at it spins away, falls over infact, quite embarassing
poor ball, short on leg stump, begging to be hit, pulls it away with disdain behind square for a boundary, just 18 more needed
nice, clean strike, Ashraful tosses it up on middle, comes down the track, gets to the pitch and clears long-on with a free flow of the bat, straight into the stands

charges down the track and tries to clear long-off this time but doesn't get the timing right, more elevation than distance on that one and Mahmudullah holds his nerve to take it over his head just inside the ropes
flighted on middle, drags it straight to midwicket
flighted on the off, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
Sammy off the mark in style, full on middle, lofts it straight back over the bowler's head for a flat six, off the middle
a freakish end this, short on the off stump, turns in, tries to smack it over midwicket, mistimes it completely as it takes the top edge and Mahmudullah at long-on takes a comfortable catch
low full toss on the off stump, driven to mid-on right at the circle for a quick single
fired in quick outside off, tries to dig it out but can't connect
fired in full on middle and off, driven towards cover
pushed off the back foot towards cover
it's all over now, West Indies win their first game of the tour as Dowlin dispatches that short one over midwicket for a boundary
